articles.description: I have been using VRS for project location for some years. I need to set up a control network for the Highway Department using a static network. I dug out the old Ashstech Extremes to set up the network. When I downloaded the files, both the almanac and datasets were dated 02.107 instead of 21.333.  I was always under the impression that the receivers got their time stamp from the GPS signals.When I dump them in a project, they appear reasonable relative to each other. articles.description: CAD Drafting Services is a software with which architects, designers, and engineers can draw buildings and other structures.
